name: cloudrun-github-actions-practice
description: Google Cloud Run FastAPI Test with Docker and GitHub Actions

scripts.docker:clean: docker stop cloudrun-github-actions-practice 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm cloudrun-github-actions-practice 2>/dev/null || true && docker rmi cloudrun-github-actions-practice 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:run:detach
scripts.docker:build:run: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:build:detach: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:detach
